ygData.subject: Re: Help!  I'm slowly losing interest in the RPG!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Okay everybody I am back, I was gone for a little bit, and didnt have time to tell everybody I was leaving, but not much happened. I m sorry your losing

Subject: Re: Help!  I'm slowly losing interest in the RPG!
References: <007001c130fc$db1590c0$0cca9d18@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

OOC: Okay everybody I am back, I was gone for a little bit, and didnt
have time to tell everybody I was leaving, but not much happened. I'm
sorry your losing interest Lurker, and I don't want you to leave, but
the RPG is really slow right now (like people taking days to reply
sighs, and its not just because of Yan's absence) and I need people to
reply before I can do stuff, plus it seems to me last time I gave an
order to Whee (Sigh), Jume (Sigh), Triggerhappy and Skullgrin, you just
kinda ignored it. I am glad to be back though, so I have some things to
say, and ask.

1. Alloran, when you were gone, Cyclonus was still patroling the skies
around Azores Islands, so you can land and report to Astrotrain.
Abominus is in the process of moving a ship, but it can be your turn
with the ship. I'm glad to see you back however. I am not sure about
Scourge and Godfather, although I suspect that they are at base. I know
I don't always give orders to everyone, but it is hard to keep track on
everything, so be like Lurker, and jump on me telling me, I am trying my
best, but I am only human :)

2. Gnyinhhh, I am now the only council member active (those leaving for
a while shouldnt have run :) another sighhhhhhhhhhh. Well since rAuq is
gone and he controls so many characters, again it slows the game down,
so since it is normally against the rules, I am going to ask if it is
all right with everyone if I control his characters until he gets back
to keep the game moving. If he dosent so much as peep in a week though,
we'll get rid of them, but if people disagree, then there you have it.
(I would make a fancysmanshy poll, but somebody who has all the access
to that has a hurt hand. By the way, heal fast Yan.:) So cast your vote,
Aye, or Nay.


3. Gunther, I don't remember what was going on with the D.E.D, so if you
could fill me in privatly.

4. Kslawdogg, what happened to Grimlock/ Nightmare/ Jagged, I don't
remember that either.

5. Sorry this was so long, but I thought it was in order, so come on
guys, help me out now that I am the "Last of the Council" and by the
way, where are your suggestions on the game and rules and so on, this
game is made by us, keep your voices heard, it's been a pretty slow term
on council with there never being more than two members on regularily,
make my life hard :)
